availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Richard Bibb (Logan County, Kentucky, physician and captain Logan Guards)

body.p: Logan County, Kentucky, physician and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Mary E. Caldwell Bibb. Father of Lizzie Bibb, Mary Bibb, and Elizabeth Bibb. Graduated from University of Pennsylvania in 1854. Physician in Logan County in 1860. Served in Logan Guards (U.S.A.) as captain c1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 1, p. 484.
"Graduates of the University of Pennsylvania," The American Journal of the Medical Sciences Vol. 28 (1854), 293.
Find A Grave, "George Richard Bibb (1830 - 1915)," Memorial #75141029, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/75141029 (accessed August 8, 2019).
KYR-0001-019-0091.
